name: One More Floor (ahmeddb, xiao2, Ahmed54123)
description:
A desolate, dark, ravaged world. Overrun. Lost. These creatures are everywhere, lurking around every corner, every shadow, where light cannot find them. Play as a child stuck in this building, cornered by mysterious, terrifying creatures, as he must fight his way to survival and to freedom!

Created for NYU Fall 2021 Interm Game Dev Final Project 

Instructions

Move through the rooms, using your flashlight to see and avoid nearby enemies. Find weapons such as guns, knives, and ammo for them in order to kill enemies you encounter. Make it to the elevator of every floor until you reach the exit.

Features
  • Randomized maps on every playthrough, so never play the same game twice!
  • You can only see enemies within your flashlight, so be wary of your surroundings.
  • Find guns, ammo and knives which can be used to create thrilling and explosive encounters with enemies!
Controls
  • WASD to move the character
  • Use the mouse to change the direction of the player
  • E to pick up items
  • R to Reload
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • TAB to toggle inventory
  • Buttons 1-5 to choose inventory slot
Credits

Development Team

Ahmed- Lead artist, Programmer, Animator

Nick- Level Design, Narrative Design

Noah- Lead Programmer, Sound Design, Art/VFX

Xiao- Project Manager, Programmer, QA
